name: cuckoo
label: Cuckoo
description: Cuckoo sandbox is an open source software for automating analysis of suspicious files. To do so it makes use of custom components that monitor the behavior of the malicious processes while running in an isolated environment.

fields.title: Server
fields.name: server_ip
fields.description: IP address or the hostname URL of the Cuckoo server to which you will connect and perform the automated operations.Default is HTTPS. Must include http:// if not HTTPS.
fields.tooltip: IP address or the hostname URL of the Cuckoo server to which you will connect and perform the automated operations.Default is HTTPS. Must include http:// if not HTTPS.

fields.title: Port Number
fields.name: port
fields.description: Specify the Port number of the Cuckoo server to which you will connect and perform automated operations.

fields.title: API Token
fields.name: api_token
fields.description: Specify the API token configured for your account for using the Cuckoo APIs.
fields.tooltip: Token set in cuckoo.conf under [cuckoo] named api_token

operations.title: Submit File
operations.description: This action submits the file for detonation on Cuckoo Sandbox for analysis.

parameters.title: File To Detonate
parameters.name: file
parameters.description: Specify a reference ID to access the attachment metadata from the FortiSOARâ„¢ Attachments module.

operations.title: Submit URL
operations.description: This action submits the URL for detonation on Cuckoo Sandbox for analysis.

parameters.title: URL To Detonate
parameters.name: url
parameters.description: specify the URL to detonate in the cuckoo sandbox

operations.title: Get Report
operations.description: This Action gets the report from cuckoo Sandbox based on the task ID provided.

parameters.title: Task ID Of The Report
parameters.name: taskid
parameters.description: Specify the task ID of the report to get its details.
